text: This is a list of awards and nominations received by American hip hop rapper, CEO and entrepreneur Chamillionaire. ==American Music Awards== The American Music Awards is an annual awards ceremony created by Dick Clark in 1973. Chamillionaire has been nominated once. |- |2006 |Chamillionaire |Favorite Breakthrough Artist | ==BET Awards== The BET Awards were established in 2001 by the Black Entertainment Television network to celebrate African Americans and other minorities in music, acting, sports, and other fields of entertainment. The awards are presented annually and broadcast live on BET. Chamillionaire has been nominated once. |- |2006 |Chamillionaire |Best New Artist | ==BET Hip Hop Awards== The BET Hip Hop Awards are hosted annually by BET for hip hop performers, producers, and music video directors. Chamillionaire has won two awards from six nominations. |- |rowspan="5"|2006 |"Ridin'" |Hip Hop Track of the Year | |- |rowspan="2"|Chamillionaire |Rookie of the Year | |- |Hip Hop MVP of the Year | |- |Ridin' |Best Collaboration | |- |Chamillionaire |Viewer's Choice Award (Wireless People's Champ) | |- |2007 |"Hip Hop Police" |Best Hip-Hop Video | ==Grammy Awards== The Grammy Awards are awarded annually by the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences. Chamillionaire has won one award from two nominations. |- |rowspan="2"|2007 |rowspan="2"|"Ridin'" |Best Rap Performance by a Duo or Group | |- |Best Rap Song | ==MTV Video Music Awards== The MTV Video Music Awards were established in 1984 by MTV to celebrate the top music videos of the year. Chamillionaire has won one award. |- |2006 |"Ridin'" |Best Rap Video | ==Ozone Awards== The Ozone Awards is an annual award ceremony that recognizes Southern hip hop. Chamillionaire has won two awards from four nominations. |- |2006 |"Ridin'" |Best Video | |- |2007 |"Doe Boy Fresh" |Best Video | |- |rowspan="2"|2008 |"Hip Hop Police" |Best Video | |- |Mixtape Messiah 3 |Best Mixtape/Street Album | ==People's Choice Awards== The People's Choice Awards is an annual awards show recognizing the people and the work of popular culture. Chamillionaire has been nominated once. |- |2006 |"Ridin'" |Favorite Hip Hop Song | ==Teen Choice Awards== The Teen Choice Awards is an annual awards show that airs on the Fox television network. The awards honor the year's biggest achievements in music, movies, sports, television, fashion, and more, voted by teen viewers (ages 13 to 19). Chamillionaire had 2 nominations, and won once. |- |rowspan="2"|2007 |rowspan="2"|"Ridin'" |Teen Choice Award for Choice Music: Rap/Hip-Hop Track | |- |Teen Choice Award for Choice Music: Summer Song | |} ==Notes== ==References== Chamillionaire Awards and nominations
title: List of awards and nominations received by Chamillionaire
